thread.title: Connexus Credit Union layoffs include 16 employees from Wausau office
thread.title_full: Connexus Credit Union layoffs include 16 employees from Wausau office

author: , Wausau Daily Herald
title: Connexus Credit Union layoffs include 16 employees from Wausau office
text: Connexus Credit Union to lay off 16 remote employees from Wausau office The credit union filed a notice with the Department of Workforce Development Thursday. WAUSAU â€“ Connexus Credit Union will lay off 16 remote workers through its Wausau office. According to a WARN notice filed Thursday with the Department of Workforce Development, Connexus Credit Union will permanently lay off 16 workers effective Nov. 11. Of those workers, 11 live in Wisconsin. According to the letter, all 16 employees work remotely and receive direction from the Wausau office. Positions cut include four underwriters, one underwriting manager, three quality control associates, six indirect loan processors, one indirect loan processing lead and one indirect loan processing manager. For more information about Connexus, visit [connexuscu.org](https://www.connexuscu.org/).
